entry.string: The Ping Module will automatically ping sites to let them know that your Xaraya Website has been updated with content. Currently, the ping module only supports the articles module via a create and update hook.

Simply hook the articles module with the ping module and the rest is done behind the scenes. The Ping Module will use the specific publication type that the content is assigned to, therefore you may want to register the individual publication types that you want to notify.
The Ping Module has no blocks included at this time.
Create will ping weblogs.com on creation of an article, update will ping when an article has been updated.
Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
